text: Lucas Tucci di Grassi (born 11 August 1984 in São Paulo) is a Brazilian Formula One racing driver. He finished as runner-up to Timo Glock in the 2007 GP2 Series season. He is now one of the race drivers for the new Formula One team Virgin Racing in 2010, alongside his former rival Glock. == Racing record == === Career summary === Season Series Team Races Wins Poles
